meanings.definition: A type of amino acid found in proteins.
meanings.sent1: Histidines are important building blocks for proteins.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study histidines to understand their role in protein structure.
meanings.sent3: The histidines in the protein party were always the life of the amino acid group.
meanings.sent4: Her love for histidines was as strong as the bonds they form in proteins.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, histidines shimmered like tiny protein jewels.

meanings.sent1: The lab contained vials of histidines for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: They added histidines to the solution to test their effects.
meanings.sent3: At the histidines convention, each molecule shared its unique story.
meanings.sent4: The histidines in the test tube danced together like a synchronized amino acid team.
meanings.sent5: The aroma in the lab was a mix of chemicals and histidines.
